name: [spacebar exam]
description:
[spacebar exam]

You completely forgot about today's exam. The only way you can pass is by cheating, but unfortunately for you your teacher is one of the strictest in the school.

What is the highest grade you can achieve before class ends or the teacher catches you?

v1.04 (8/22/16)

- Now playable in browser! :)
- Reduced game size from 90MB to 20MB
- Slight "wind-up" adjustments

v1.03 (8/21/16)

- Added variable teacher "wind-up" delay
- Small lighting fixes

v1.02 (8/21/16)

- Added teacher "wind-up"
- Added high score function
- Changed teacher timings
- Improved lighting
- Changed outdoor scenery
- Small optimizations
- Face change

v1.00 (8/20/16)

- First release!
